General.Name: Tristar Gold
General.Description: TriStar Gold, Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of precious metal prospects in the Americas. Its flagship property is its 100% owned the Castelo de Sonhos gold project that consists of approximately 17,177 hectares of mineral rights on various contiguous claims located in Pará State, Brazil. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona.
General.Address: 7950 East Acoma Drive, Scottsdale, AZ, United States, 85260
